play.cache

Interface CacheApi

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCacheApi

    public interface CacheApi
    The Cache API.

      • get

        Retrieves an object by key.

      • getOrElse

        <T> T getOrElse(java.lang.String key,
              java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> block,
              int expiration)
        Retrieve a value from the cache, or set it from a default Callable function.
        Parameters:
        key - Item key.
        block - block returning value to set if key does not exist
        expiration - expiration period in seconds.
        Returns:
        value

      • getOrElse

        <T> T getOrElse(java.lang.String key,
              java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> block)
        Retrieve a value from the cache, or set it from a default Callable function. The value has no expiration.
        Parameters:
        key - Item key.
        block - block returning value to set if key does not exist
        Returns:
        value

      • set

        void set(java.lang.String key,
       java.lang.Object value,
       int expiration)
        Sets a value with expiration.
        Parameters:
        key - Item key.
        value - The value to set.
        expiration - expiration in seconds

      • set

        void set(java.lang.String key,
       java.lang.Object value)
        Sets a value without expiration.
        Parameters:
        key - Item key.
        value - The value to set.

      • remove

        void remove(java.lang.String key)
        Removes a value from the cache.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to remove the value for.
